page.title: 19CRIME IN CASTLE VALE
page.content: CASTLE VALE RARELY HAS LARGE CRIMES, BUT IT IS AN AREA WHERE THERE ARE MANY PETTY CRIMES COMMITTED.THE MOST COMMON CRIME IS CAR STEALING.CARS ARE TAKEN FROM THE ESTATE AND NEARBY AREAS, USUALLY BY YOUNG ADULTS FOR JOY RIDING. THE CAR IS OFTEN SMASHED BEFORE IT IS ABANDONED IN THE STREETS.ANOTHER COMMON CRIME ON THE ESTATE IS VANDALISM.THE SCHOOLS AND LIBRARY OFTEN HAVE SMASHED WINDOWS;IT IS SO BAD THAT PLASTIC WINDOWS HAVE BEEN INSTALLED IN THESE BUILDINGS AND IN ALL THE BUS STOPS. GRAFFITTI IS PAINTED ON THE SIDES OF BUILDINGS ALL AROUND THE ESTATE. HOUSE BREAKING IS ANOTHER COMMON CRIME.THE THIEVES USUALLY STEAL T.V. SETS AND VIDEOS.UNFORTUNATELY THERE IS NO POLICE STATION,ONLY A POLICE UNIT ON THE ESTATE,SO THERE ARE NO REGULAR POLICE PATROLS.
